The '''Mahamata Bulletin Board''' is a message board located in [[Sumeru City]], at the Docks. The messages randomly cycle through every time it is interacted with.

==Messages==
{{Dialogue start}}
===Introduction===
<!-- The below dialogue is presented differently from the intro message in [[Mondstadt General Goods Order Board]] where it precedes all other messages. Here it's treated like a regular messaged displayed at random. Therefore it should be put under its own section. -->
:'''Mahamata Bulletin Board:''' This Bulletin Board is set up by the Mahamata to publicize important matters in Sumeru City. Questions or doubts regarding the notices on the Bulletin Board can be posted here as well.

===Arrest Warrant: Mustah===
:'''Arrest Warrant:''' Bounty Notice: [[Mustah]]
:'''Arrest Warrant:''' This man disguises himself as a Mahamata to engage in extortion and robbery around the port of the [[Grand Bazaar|Bazaar]]. The [[Citadel of Regzar]] is now conducting investigations on him.
:'''Arrest Warrant:''' There are reports of him hiding in the jungle. Please report any sightings of him.

===Arrest Warrant: Kasim===
:'''Arrest Warrant:''' Bounty Notice: [[Kasim]]
:'''Arrest Warrant:''' This man claims to be a renowned bandit who travels across nations, but he is in fact a fraud who has never appeared in the power rankings of the Eremites.
:'''Arrest Warrant:''' Many fraud cases linked to him have been reported lately. Please stay vigilant and avoid falling for his scams.

===Anahitian Blessing Distribution===
:'''Mahamata Announcement:''' Distribution of this year's [[Anahitian Blessing]] has begun.
:'''Mahamata Announcement:''' In principle, distribution will be carried out according to last year's policies and requirements. Details of relevant information have been posted in the [[Akasha]].
:'''Mahamata Announcement:''' If there are any changes, please contact your nearest Mahamata in advance to submit a modification request to the [[Akademiya]].

===Magnificent Palace in Forest===
:'''Message:''' "Have you heard? The [[Forest Watchers]] found [[The Palace of Alcazarzaray|a magnificent palace]] that came into being from nowhere in the north of the forest."
:'''Message:''' "But everyone who went there got cheated out of all the money they had. All they had left is their underwear when the Forest Watchers found them."
:'''Message:''' "And they were crying and refused to say what happened. It's absolutely horrifying."
:'''Message:''' "It's best not to wander around in the forest."

===Theft===
:'''Mahamata Announcement:''' Please do not carry too much [[Mora]] in crowded areas as a precaution against theft.
:'''Mahamata Announcement:''' If you find your properties stolen, please do not seek help from the [[Eremites]] patrolling in the vicinity.
:'''Mahamata Announcement:''' Because it's very likely that they are the culprit.

===Eleazar===
:'''Mahamata Announcement:''' Cases of [[Eleazar]] have been on the rise in the city. If you experience symptoms including numbness of the skin, weakness in the limbs, or gray and black scales forming on the torso, please go to [[Bimarstan]] to receive treatment immediately.
:'''Mahamata Announcement:''' Missing the best window for treatment and allowing the condition to take a turn for the worse will lead to severe consequences. such as incapacitation. Please take heed of this notice.

===Forest Ranger===
:'''Message:''' "Be careful if you're planning a trip to the rainforest. My mentor sent me there to collect some herbs the other day, and I almost lost my life to a [[Rishboland Tiger]]."
:'''Message:''' "I was lucky to be saved by a Forest Ranger nearby. [[Collei|She]] called herself a Trainee Forest Ranger, but she seemed really experienced. Most importantly, she gave me delicious food to help ease my shock."
:'''Message:''' "I've heard that she's [[Tighnari]]'s student. It's just as they say &mdash; like teacher, like pupil!"

===Akasha Terminal===
;(Before completing [[Where the Boat of Consciousness Lies]])
::'''Mahamata Announcement:''' Travelers from afar, welcome to Sumeru. As a display of [[Greater Lord Rukkhadevata]]'s kindness and mercy for all, Akasha Terminals are now available to all tourists.
::'''Mahamata Announcement:''' Tourists can claim one from Mahamata [[Panah]] upon arrival.

;(After completing Where the Boat of Consciousness Lies)
::'''Mahamata Announcement:''' Travelers from afar, welcome to Sumeru. As a display of the Dendro Archon's kindness and mercy for all, Akasha Terminals are now available to all tourists.
::'''Mahamata Announcement:''' Tourists can claim one from Mahamata [[Panah]] upon arrival.

;(After completing ???){{Verify}}
::'''Mahamata Announcement:''' As the Akasha System is no longer in use, the bulletin board has now been recommissioned for the convenience of local residents and travelers.
::'''Mahamata Announcement:''' All important matters throughout Sumeru will be posted here on a regular basis. Should any crucial information be missing, please contact related personnel from the Akademiya.

===The Eremites===
:'''Corps of Thirty Announcement:''' Special reminder: The Eremites are the only authorized mercenary organization in Sumeru.
:'''Corps of Thirty Announcement:''' Please do not trust strangers easily in case of getting cheated by scammers.
:'''Corps of Thirty Announcement:''' If you wish to hire bodyguards, security staff, or have any other requests, please contact Parchamdar [[Rukh Shah]] from the [[Corps of Thirty]] or post a commission via the Akademiya's liaison, [[Effendi]].

===Lambad's Tavern Notice===
:'''[[Lambad's Tavern]] Notice:''' Since the Mahamata won't be using this to post announcements anymore, it's perfect as a message board for our tavern. Please feel free to leave a message here.
:'''[[Alhaitham|Message]]:''' "Have the ten crates of wine that I ordered arrived? I came yesterday only to find out they didn't arrive."
:'''Reply:''' "That's impossible! A [[Kaveh|blond person]] came in here earlier claiming to be your roommate and took it all. I even remember both of you coming in together the other day. You must have made a mistake."
:'''Message:''' "...Alright. I get it."

===Bulletin Board Abandoned===
;(Before completing ???){{Verify}}
:'''Mahamata Announcement:''' The announcements throughout Sumeru are being displayed via the Akasha now. Please wear your Akasha Terminal at all times to avoid missing any important notices.
:'''Mahamata Announcement:''' This Bulletin Board will be temporarily kept for the convenience of foreign merchants, the elderly, and children. It may be removed anytime in the future. Please refrain from relying on it too much.

;(After completing ???){{Verify}}
::'''Mahamata Announcement:''' As the Akasha System is no longer in use, the bulletin board has now been recommissioned for the convenience of local residents and travelers.
::'''Mahamata Announcement:''' All important matters throughout Sumeru will be posted here on a regular basis. Should any crucial information be missing, please contact related personnel from the Akademiya.

===Bimarstan===
:'''Bimarstan Notice:''' [[Bimarstan]] is a medical facility under [[Amurta]] that provides free medical care to all residents of Sumeru.
:'''Bimarstan Notice:''' Bimarstan's doctors are licensed by {{Rubi|Amurta|Biology}}. Our diagnoses are treatment plans are reviewed multiple times by the Akasha. We provide the safest, most professional medical services for all Sumeru residents.
:'''Bimarstan Notice:''' Please do not trust unidentified or unlicensed doctors to avoid financial losses and irreversible harm to your health.
{{Dialogue end}}
